item.title: Hot Chicks + No Sugar + SGATV
item.description: ITR presents: 5 Oct 2024 @ Hitness Club startttt 20h00 **Hot Chicks ** (leipzig wavy punk) No Sugar (hamburg garage rock) SGATV (swiss ufo punk) more info coming soon hungry eyes by Malwine

item.title: Ryskinder + Warm Swords
item.description: ITR presents: 29 Sept 2024 doors 17h00 start 18h00 Ryskinder website Warm Swords Album: War On Words 1&amp;2 more info coming soon On September 21 and 22, Ryskinder will hold a workshop at Pracht about writing songs with samples. Highly recommended! Click here for more information. poster by Roee

item.title: Blitzer + Snitsh Pitsh + Glintshake + Neon Lies

item.title: SHAM + Neta Polturak + Just Fish + Sax Tape + DJ MOTHBABY
item.description: ITR presents: 18 Sept 2024 üö™s 19h00 ‚≠êt 20h00 SHAM (devotional experimental folk / North Carolina, USA) bc Neta Polturak (mythical solo dream pop / Berlin) website bc JustFish (psych glitch grooves / Porto, Chile) bc Sax Tape (twonky tape trip hop / Brescia, IT) bc DJ MOTHBABY sc poster/drawings by Samus (IG) - get a RISO copy at the show. ask for exact location: post@u-bac.de
